The Supreme Committee had announced that the school year will begin on November 1 and also endorsed the blended learning. Oman TV will telecast lessons for Grade 12 daily on weekdays between 2:30 pm to 6:30 pm. Schedules for school classes on TV are available at the ministry website.    It is estimated that around 82 per cent of schools will implement an e-learning system, while 10 per cent will follow blended education, and the rest will have full attendance in schools.
